â€œnotificationsâ€ â€“ Used to send desktop notification. For example when a new message arrive or App is updated.
â€œcontextMenusâ€ â€“ Allow to add more settings when right click in the App icon in the browser toolbar and browser context menu.
â€œstorageâ€ â€“ Used to save settings on your local computer.
â€œscriptingâ€ â€“ Used to be able to insert JS or CSS on the required host/domains.
â€œsystem.displayâ€ â€“ Used to detect the display size and position the Extension window.
â€œunlimitedStorageâ€ â€“ Storage is limited to 5MB of data that may not be enough to store all configs.
â€œhost_permissionsâ€ â€“ Permission to access to some hosts/domains that we must modify in order to provide the desired functionality detailed in the functionality. It also allows that you can share content (links or text) from other pages directly to inside the App and send it as a Chat to a friend for example. Also used to allow intercommunication with other WWEvents Apps (i.e. Emojis).
â€œactiveTabâ€ â€“ Permission to access the window that the extension is running and is show to the user.
â€œall_urlsâ€ â€“ Permission required for users be able to take screenshots of the current window â€“ captureVisibleTab.
